name: Bird Quest DX
description:
From the ancient textbooks of Bird History comes a reawakened tale! Explore the land of Zeed (named) like never before!

Featuring: Slight visual upgrades, better water, fixed events

4 Brand new characters!

Two brand new maps!

One reworked map!

Branching route split?!

A billion fun easter eggs in TOO HARD!! mode!

A cool reward for players who beat the game three times!

A nice prize for players who beat the game on TOO HARD!! with no unit deaths.

A seperate version of the game, featuring 80+ (not 80+) songs sung by ME, Dankboi68!

GO ON, BIRD! FIGHT THE DEMON DRAGON DARK DEATH LORD! DX!
